trans-unit.source: Contains methods that make client-side providers available to the client.
trans-unit.target: Contiene metodi che rendono disponibili al client i provider sul lato client.

trans-unit.source: Registers an assembly that contains client-side providers.
trans-unit.target: Registra un assembly che contiene i provider del lato client.

trans-unit.source: This method is called on startup by UI Automation clients that use client-side UI Automation providers loaded from an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato all'avvio dai client di automazione interfaccia utente che utilizzano il provider di automazione interfaccia utente lato client caricato da un assembly.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use providers implemented in their own assembly should call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviders%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni che utilizzano i provider implementati nei propri assembly devono chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviders%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For example code, see [Register a Client-Side Provider Assembly](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/register-a-client-side-provider-assembly.md).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio di codice, vedere [registrare un Assembly di Provider lato Client](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/register-a-client-side-provider-assembly.md).

trans-unit.source: The assembly could not be loaded.
This method is called on startup by clients that implement their own client-side providers.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato all'avvio dai client che implementano i propri provider lato client.

trans-unit.source: Clients that use providers from a separate assembly must call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviderAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I client che utilizzano provider da un assembly separato devono chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviderAssembly%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For example code, see [Implement UI Automation Providers in a Client Application](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/implement-ui-automation-providers-in-a-client-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio di codice, vedere [implementare i provider di automazione interfaccia utente in un'applicazione Client](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/implement-ui-automation-providers-in-a-client-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The assembly could not be loaded.
